name: Lake Bronze Volcano
description:
(PLEASE NOTE: This is my first VR Game, and as such it has not been designed with the health and wellbeing of a computer in mind; It may crash yours.)

Your curiosity has lead you deep into the Sulfur Valley to investigate Lake Bronze, and it's Volcano that's said to have a deep secret within. (That I didn't have time to add)  But the path is crumbling, and I suspect that the route can only take one last expedition before it will fall apart.

VR Controls

-Left Stick to move

-Right Stick to turn

-A to jump
